Utilizzo in Cucina

Risotto al Gorgonzola

Ricetta (4 persone):

  • Riso Carnaroli 320g
  • Gorgonzola Dolce 150g
  • Brodo vegetale 1.2L
  • Burro 60g
  • Vino bianco 80ml
  • Noci 50g (opzionale)
Procedimento:
  • Tostare riso
  • Sfumare con vino
  • Cuocere aggiungendo brodo
  • A fine cottura: mantecare con gorgonzola + burro
  • Servire con noci tostate

Pizza Gorgonzola e Noci

Topping:

  • Base bianca (mozzarella, no pomodoro)
  • Gorgonzola Dolce a pezzetti
  • Noci sgusciate
  • Miele (dopo cottura)
  • Rucola fresca

Pasta Gorgonzola e Speck

  • Penne 400g
  • Gorgonzola 120g
  • Speck 100g a listarelle
  • Panna 150ml
  • Noci

FAQ

Il gorgonzola √® sicuro in gravidanza?

DIPENDE. Il Gorgonzola DOP √® fatto con latte pastorizzato = generalmente sicuro. PER√í le muffe (penicillium) potrebbero essere problematiche. Consultare sempre il medico prima del consumo in gravidanza.

Come conservare il gorgonzola?

Temperatura: 2-6¬∞C Confezione: Carta alimentare + pellicola Durata: 7-10 giorni dopo apertura Mai congelare (perde cremosit√†)

Conclusione

en_US.content_html:
Gorgonzola Dolce PDO

The Prince of Blue Cheeses

The Gorgonzola Dolce PDO is the most versatile Italian blue cheese in the kitchen. With its creamy texture, delicate flavor and characteristic blue-green veins, it's perfect for creamy risottos, gourmet pizzas, velvety sauces and pairings with fruit and honey.

PDO Characteristics

Production Area

Certified territory:

  • Regions: Piedmont, Lombardy
  • Provinces: Novara, Vercelli, Biella, Verbano-Cusio-Ossola, Pavia, Milan, Como, Bergamo, Brescia, Cremona, Lodi, Lecco, Monza and Brianza, Varese

Technical Profile

ParameterValue
Aging50-60 days (vs 80+ spicy)
Wheel weight6-12 kg
TextureCreamy, spreadable
FlavorSweet, delicate, slightly spicy
VeinsBlue-green (Penicillium roqueforti)
Fat contentMin 48% dry matter

Gorgonzola Dolce vs Piccante

AspectDolcePiccante
Aging50-60 days80-100+ days
TextureCreamy, softHard, crumbly
FlavorDelicate, sweetIntense, spicy
VeinsLight, distributedMarked, concentrated
UseRisottos, sauces, dessertsTasting, cheese board
Price/kg‚Ç¨12-16‚Ç¨14-18

Culinary Uses

Gorgonzola Risotto

Recipe (4 servings):

  • Carnaroli rice 320g
  • Gorgonzola Dolce 150g
  • Vegetable broth 1.2L
  • Butter 60g
  • White wine 80ml
  • Walnuts 50g (optional)
Method:
  • Toast rice
  • Deglaze with wine
  • Cook adding broth
  • At end: stir in gorgonzola + butter
  • Serve with toasted walnuts

Gorgonzola and Walnut Pizza

Topping:

  • White base (mozzarella, no tomato)
  • Gorgonzola Dolce pieces
  • Shelled walnuts
  • Honey (after baking)
  • Fresh arugula

Pasta with Gorgonzola and Speck

  • Penne 400g
  • Gorgonzola 120g
  • Speck 100g in strips
  • Cream 150ml
  • Walnuts

LAPA Gorgonzola for Switzerland

  • ‚úÖ PDO Certified
  • ‚úÖ Creamy Dolce (50-60 days)
  • ‚úÖ Vacuum-packed portions 200g-2kg
  • ‚úÖ 24-48h Delivery
  • ‚úÖ Whole wheels available

Formats

  • 200-500g: Portioned vacuum-packed
  • 1-2kg: Pieces for weekly use
  • 6-12kg: Whole wheel

Pairings

Wines

  • üç∑ Passito di Pantelleria - Sweet, honeyed
  • üç∑ Sauternes - French, elegant
  • üç∑ Moscato d'Asti - Aromatic, sweet

Other Pairings

  • Wildflower, chestnut, acacia honey
  • Pears, figs, grapes
  • Walnuts, hazelnuts
  • Onion, fig jams
  • Whole wheat bread, breadsticks

FAQ

Is gorgonzola safe during pregnancy?

IT DEPENDS. Gorgonzola PDO is made with pasteurized milk = generally safe. BUT the molds (penicillium) could be problematic. Always consult your doctor before consumption during pregnancy.

How to store gorgonzola?

Temperature: 2-6¬∞C Packaging: Food paper + plastic wrap Duration: 7-10 days after opening Never freeze (loses creaminess)

Conclusion

The Gorgonzola Dolce PDO is the perfect blue cheese for restaurants: versatile, creamy, appreciated by a wide clientele. Perfect for signature risottos, gourmet pizzas, creative sauces.
